      • crawlHiddenAnchors

        public CrawlRules.CrawlRulesBuilder crawlHiddenAnchors(boolean anchors)
        Set Crawljax to click hidden anchors or not. Default is false.
        Pro:
        The benefit of clicking hidden anchors is that Crawljax isn't capable of clicking elements that are hidden for example because you have to hover another element first. This happens in most fold-out menus for example. Enabling this function allows Crawljax to find more states that are hidden this way.
        Con:
        If a anchor tag is never visible in the browser in any way, Crawljax will crawl it anyway. This makes the Crawl inconsistent with what the user experiences.

      • followExternalLinks

        public CrawlRules.CrawlRulesBuilder followExternalLinks(boolean follow)
        Follow links in anchor tags that have an href element that points to an URL outside of this website. This does not prevent JavaScript from opening an external URL.

        Once the browser reaches an external URL it will not accept that URL as a new state. Crawljax is not meant to crawl outside a website. This option exists so that you can check all URLs for 404 errors.

        Parameters:
        follow - Set to true to follow exteranl urls. Default is false.

      • endRules

        public CrawljaxConfiguration.CrawljaxConfigurationBuilder endRules()
        Helper method for method chaining. Now you can do 
         CrawljaxConfiguration.builderFor("http://example.com")
         .crawlRules()
         .followExternalLinks(true)
         .endRules()
         .build();
        Returns:
        The CrawljaxConfiguration.CrawljaxConfigurationBuilder to make method chaining easier.
